You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

final_response: Agremiação Sportiva Arapiraquense, whose full name is Agremiação Sportiva Arapiraquense, competes in the Campeonato Brasileiro Série C and has 17,000 members. The champions of the Campeonato Brasileiro Série C are Vila Nova Futebol Clube.
